programme.title: Deb's House

programme.desc: Multiple eliminations dwindle the house down to four and brings Ms. Deb to tears; celebrity guest Tracy Morgan motivates the final four rappers; a photo shoot at DaRucci Leather makes Ms. Deb question who wants it the most.
